DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the feasibility and safety of using a new device called Yukio's Uterine Manipulating Instrument (YUMI). The YUMI is a type of uterine manipulator. It is a reusable metal device designed to be simple and study. It is also adjustable in size which makes it easy for surgeons to use. It will be placed at the beginning of the surgery and removed at the end. This study will allow the researchers to find out if the surgeons find the YUMI effective and easy to use. It will also allow the researchers to see if the device is safe. This is the first time that the YUMI is being used in humans.
DOC.criteria: Participant must be scheduled for a total laparoscopic or roboticassisted hysterectomy for a gynecologic condition Participants must be 18 years of age or older Participant is not eligible if the surgeon does not plan to use a uterine manipulator
